basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Proven Web Developer based in Dubai with expertise in full-stack development, responsive web applications, and AI solutions. Proficient in modern web technologies including Vue.js, React.js, Node.js, and Python. Driven by a passion for building robust, scalable applications that deliver user-friendly web experiences.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Full-stack engineer contributing to a retargeting platform, focusing on front-end development, responsive design, and API integration.
highlights: Architected and developed key dashboard and form components for campaign management using Nuxt.js, Vue.js, and TypeScript
Implemented responsive design principles and ensured cross-browser compatibility for a seamless user experience
Collaborated on system design and integrated APIs for smooth data flow and application functionality

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Led frontend development and engineered AI-powered solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver functional web pages.
highlights: Led frontend refactoring of an exam management platform using Vue.js and Vuetify, improving user experience and page load times
Engineered and deployed an AI-powered browser extension (AdCognition) using TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time ad detection
Developed RoboGPT, an Nvidia Isaac Sim extension for robot control via natural language commands using LLMs and OpenAI APIs
Engaged in code reviews and collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate complex mockups into functional web pages

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Developed innovative automation solutions while providing customer support.
highlights: Developed Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software that automated form-filling and email generation, improving team efficiency

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded first place for developing Otis, a JavaScript-based templating software automating form-filling and email generation.

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application
projects.description: A full-stack social media application demonstrating end-to-end web development with React.js and MongoDB.
highlights: Designed and developed dynamic frontend features using React.js
Built UI features using a component-based architecture and managed application state with Redux
